Histrio-mastix· Or, The player vvhipt Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
[62] p.
Printed [by George Eld] for Th: Thorp, [London] : 1610.
"Probably a revision by Marston of an earlier play by an unknown author"--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-H⁴ (-A1). The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
